script.name: Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.Pirate.Boss.AI
script.description: Pirate Guild - Cmd : Local Boss Job

line.comment: * Boss AI using basic Finite State Machine AI type
* LU Update (Solarahawk): updated get target arguments

line.text: 'Begin Pirate Boss AI for ship %s in sector at %s'

line.comment: * skip if [THIS]-> is script 'anarkis.acc.task.repairs' on stack of task=900
* Get array of transporters with given parameters

line.text: '(boss) %s Sector: %s Order: Attack %s (cargo value %s credits) in %s'

line.comment: * Raise bounty after successfull killing of the transporter

line.text: '(boss) %s Sector: %s Order: Patrol homebase %s for %s minutes'

sval.val: Pirate Guild - Cmd : Local Boss Job
Begin Pirate Boss AI for ship %s in sector at %s
(boss) %s Sector: %s Order: Attack %s (cargo value %s credits) in %s
(boss) %s Sector: %s Order: Patrol homebase %s for %s minutes
Boss AI using basic Finite State Machine AI type
LU Update (Solarahawk): updated get target arguments
skip if [THIS]-> is script 'anarkis.acc.task.repairs' on stack of task=900
Get array of transporters with given parameters
Raise bounty after successfull killing of the transporter
